message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000. This is a great price considering the value and uniqueness of the product.  What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. I am willing to pay $15000 for it.

Bob, I understand your position, but I need to recover more of my investment in this product. I'm willing to lower the price to $17500, but this is my final offer. If you are not able to accept this price, I will need to explore other options.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I am willing to pay $16000 for the product.
